question: Overdose?? Dangerous or no?
question_content:
I'm 14 years old, I weigh around 100 pounds, I took 2500 mg of tylenol because I'm stupid. Please don't ask questions. 

I barely eat...if that makes any difference whatsoever.
And I've been on Zoloft for about a week.

Should I be worried? Or am I making a big deal out of nothing?

I really need serious answers.

I'm afraid to go to sleep in case something happens..?

answers.answer_content:
you should be worried.. you should tell your parents..   like now.. 

this is serious..  the combo of being on Zoloft.. and not eating and taking such a large dose of Tylenol and you age..  is very bad!

DO me a huge favor.. cause I deal with depressed people alot.. 
and have your parents call your doctor..

Your stomach is probably going to be very upset.  You should contact poison control and see what they advise you to do.
1-800-222-1222

you can get an ulcer u cant OD on asprin but can get pretty sick from it. it is dangerous but not deadly unless you do get an ulcer. go tell ur 'rents and have them take you to a hospital so they can get it all out of you. they'll giver u charcoal crap to get it out of ur system. my dad had to do that when he tried to OD on his depression medication and pain meds. plus why are you on zoloft? it causes suicidal thoughts for teens.
